summary: Project now focused on fixing a production issue where chat rooms are not displayed in the lobby unless a search or category is selected, likely due to persisted React Query cache returning an empty array for the ['chatrooms'] query key.
architectural_notes: Production uses persisted React Query cache that can survive deployments; lobby must handle/clear stale cached [] for query key ['chatrooms'] on initial mount.
known_issues: Production lobby shows no rooms until search/category selection, likely due to stale persisted React Query cache containing [] for ['chatrooms'].

existing_features.title: Ensure the lobby does not boot with a persisted cached empty array for the canonical React Query key ['chatrooms'] in production by purging/ignoring that cached value on initial app load (actor-ready) and forcing a fresh network refetch so rooms display immediately without requiring search/category interaction.

new_feature_requests.summary: Purge/ignore persisted React Query cache for the lobby ['chatrooms'] query on initial load in production so rooms display without requiring search/category selection.
